content:
I am a final-year undergraduate student from Department of Automation, Tsinghua University. I also minor in statistics at Center for Statistical Science.
My research interest lies in Reinforcement Learning and Machine Learning. My research mainly focus on Statistical Reinforcement Learning I am also interested in Model-based RL, Hierarchical RL and Multi-Agent RL.
Currently I am a summer intern at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, advised by Professor Nan Jiang. In Tsinghua University, I am an undergraduate researcher in IVG Lab, advised by Professor Jiwen Lu.

title: Kaiqian Han(韩凯乾)
